events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated for days, and I'm starting to worry about the delay.
The issue has been classified under 'Delivery Delay' due to the customer's report of late shipment and stagnant tracking information.
An agent from the logistics support team has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery case and will reach out shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear your order is delayed. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you currently have? This will help me investigate the issue more accurately.
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The last tracking update was five days ago, and it still shows 'in transit.' I haven’t received any recent notifications.

Thank you for the information. I’ve escalated the shipment status to our delivery partner. They expect a further delay of 2-3 days due to unexpectedly high demand. We will monitor closely and update you.
I understand the delay now. While it’s frustrating to wait longer, I appreciate you keeping me updated and looking into this for me.
The package was delivered today, and we’re glad to confirm successful delivery. Please inform us if there is anything else we can assist with.
Just checking in to make sure your order arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay.
As the delivery issue has been resolved and confirmed, we are now closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
